website_summaries.verdict: Reliable line laser level that’s made for use in rugged conditions and awkward setups.
pros: Includes a 360-degree mounting bracket, so you can use it almost anywhere
Tough outer case guards against falls to the floor and moisture
cons: Seems to go through batteries faster than it should

customer_reviews.title: Magnet too weak!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace dewalt. It’s better price, and same function as dewalt, actually one more vertical measure. It’s great but with 1 downside, magnets too weak. It will slide down even it’s attached to metal studs. If it has stronger magnets, it ll be better than any other brand out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dong

customer_reviews.title: Laser works well, but battery cover is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Laser works well. The biggest issue I have, and it is not the lasers fault, is bucking in the laser to a predefined reference line I have. I am deducting one star because it was almost impossible to open and close the battery cover. I thought I was going to break it off before it finally opened. Closing it also quite diffcult and required a lot of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: nomad123

customer_reviews.title: While inexpensive compared to other laser levels...
customer_reviews.text: this Cross Line Laser Level from Klein is very disappointing. It's very hard to see the red laser especially is a semi-lit room. I've only used this laser level from a 10-ft range hence can't speak for it's usability beyond 10-ft distance. I just wish the laser lines are brighter.
customer_reviews.author: trashworthy

customer_reviews.title: Great level.
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommend getting a tripod to attach this to. Most common negative thing I read was the battery cover was hard to remove which would be true if your fingers were made of jello. Cover opened just fine for me. It casts the lines straight forward so if you need them high you will need to have the level high i.e. a tripod is handy. I found the magnets were not strong enough to attach to the thin metal found in drywall corners but worked well on any metal thicker than that. Comes with a nice protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: idk it seems the pendulum is a bit stiff to adjust
customer_reviews.text: stiff pendulum. It's like you have to set it, then shake it a bit with the idea of setting the pendulum (heavier to light/minimal settling shake) since the pendulum may have been overtightened or underlubricated or something. It's a bit fussy but the horizontal is better than the vertical. The vertical plumb line seemed unreliable to even bother though I've only tested the vertical once up against a brand new 78" door level. I think the horizontal can maybe be useful/reliable but you might have to learn how the lazer works in various temperatures and at different distances.
customer_reviews.author: jayl

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not nearly bright enough on the lines!
customer_reviews.text: I love Klein tools so even after reading a few semi negative reviews I bought the laser anyway. I agree with others regarding the battery compartment locking tab... I’ll be surprised if it last nearly as long as the laser itself. I also agree that the laser line is very difficult to see under normal lighting conditions. The plumb bob laser is very bright and easy to see though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Worsham

customer_reviews.title: battery cover
customer_reviews.text: It is like other buyer Jeff said: I agree with others regarding the battery compartment locking tab... I’ll be surprised if it last nearly as long as the laser itself. When I put the battery in it first time, It was broken a little bit. I used it very carefully when I changed battery! So I do not think it will keep longer time!
customer_reviews.author: Sanger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this laser! Since everyone on the job site has dewalt, mine isnt a target for theft, or the good old "maybe this is mine so I'll just take it" lol. Only thing I would change is have a green laser as an option, shows up better for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: high quality tool and carry case.
customer_reviews.text: in direct sunlight the horitontal 'line' level can be seen about 20-25 ft. (so 40 ft if you place it in the middle of your project) any kind of shade and that increases a lot. it has horizontal and vertical "line" projections and a plumb 'dot' projection. this is a very high quality feeling tool and carry case. its my first Klein purchase and i am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but design flaws detract significantly
customer_reviews.text: Magnets arent strong enough to hold the laser to metal studs. The product is much heavier and a bit bulkier than dewalt's standard crossline laser. The rare earth magnets are not flush with the plastic surface which causes it to slide down metal objects its stuck to. Not secure at all. I had to take the magnets out and sand down the surface then adhere the magnets back to the laser. Another issue I had with this product is that it doesnt rotate smoothly. I had to add a washer to get it to rotate smoothly. On the other hand the laser lines are very accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money for a better laser
customer_reviews.text: Low quality laser line for the money. Burns up the batteries and even with strong batteries it's not a bright and strong laser line to work off of
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: You can do better than this Klein
customer_reviews.text: It does level out quickly which is nice but the only thing good about this laser level is the price I should have listened to all the reviews I read and gone with my gut . The magnets are definitely not strong enough for the weight if the metal is too thin it just slides right down.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for two projects now. I used the plumb spot to locate ceiling lights and the level line to install siding. As with all red lasers it can be a little hard to see in full daylight. Units seems accurate and durable and overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hannon

customer_reviews.title: You need this.  It’s awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Only a few dollars more than simple plumb bob, and additional functionality is huge additional value. Only thing I’ve found it can’t do would be lock in random angle like up a stairwell for handrail brackets. It’s level and plumb or nothing. I’m really happy with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Andy F

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Nice laser level. Seems the design makes it a little bigger than necessary and it's pretty bulky. It does perform well and for a brand name tool is very reasonably priced. The case is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: ShynB

customer_reviews.title: Great Level
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this Level. Laser is bright even in lit conditions. Self leveling works great, is a time saver & projected laser lines are perfectly Level. Included mounts & magnets really eliminates the need for a stand in most scenarios For the reviewer's complaining about the battery door, yes door is tight, I found sliding a flat head screwdriver under the clip securing the battery door easily pops door off with minimal pressure.
customer_reviews.author: George P

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: As an electrician. It takes a lot of labor out of laying out lighting, especially on vaulted ceilings among other trade related tasks. As a hunter it aids in scope mounting. If you have a project outside you will have take your readings at dusk or dawn since ANY laser is hard to see in mid day conditions. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this instead of buying to separate lasers.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this all few days it lasted before it dissapeared. Honestly all a normal electrician needs that I can think of. The case is though.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: First off, I was not expecting the actual size of the tool to be as large as it is. It looked to be the size of a 30ft tape measure in the online photos. It comes in a nice solid carry case and th 3 Energizer batteries, not cheap no name batteries as many products do. It works great and is better than expected! I am about to do a custom staircase job and this will help in both speed and accuracy during the layout.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: I'll stick to dewalt in the future
customer_reviews.text: Magnets became loose after just a couple of uses, if you need replacement magnets you'd have to return the whole thing. It's a pain in the behind the process.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Masaya

customer_reviews.title: Great laser lever
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Saves me so much time at work. It may be a little bit hard to replace the batteries but you dont really need to do this often. Compared with other brands, this one is the best value for your money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One flaw
customer_reviews.text: The only flaw I have is for some reason the vertical line laser doesn’t show right above as do other lasers so I have to pull a square line out further out from what I’m plumbing up as to see where the line is but in the distance line is crisp an clear
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect laser level for home use and more than likely can be used out in the field too. The cost is reasonable considering there are so many functions that can be used and compared to more expensive models Klein steppes the game up here. I’m using it to level a floor amongst other projects that are being done.
customer_reviews.author: Hyphyriggs

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work long
customer_reviews.text: Worked initially, but after just a couple of uses the vertical line quit functioning
customer_reviews.author: curtro

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want. There are others out there that are cheaper but trust me spend the extra and get this one. It does everything you need, it's built to last and comes with a heavy duty case to keep it safe
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great layout tool for electricians. So many usage options. Multi functional so only one laser is needed
customer_reviews.author: k.harper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: High quality, perfect design and resistance Batteries drain out some fast than I like but it's not a problem using rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.author: Lord HardFace

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool- great price point
customer_reviews.text: I use this laser for boxes and lights as a residential electrician. Having cross line and a dot all in one was the major selling point for me. It is somewhat bulky but that is outweighed by its versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Abruska

customer_reviews.title: The accuracy is important!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother-in-law who works in a construction jobs. He said it is spot-on for the price, affordable and does its job accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected. Good quality from Klein. The carrying case is nice for traveling to multiple job sites. Vertical laser is very helpful for laying out multi floor penetrations.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Normally i would need two lasers to do what this one does. One great price and it works awsome. Trying to layout lights on a ceiling on your own with a tape measure can be a hassle. This allows me to layout on floor an laser it to the 30’ ceiling easily
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas D.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Strong laser in bright conditions, very accurate, easy to use, and works well with a tripod. I used it for doing a lighting plan on a vaulted ceiling. The plum-bob worked great. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: curtis schmieder

customer_reviews.title: Very good but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good level laser but bigger than other ones and that makes it just a little harder to work with it
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Magnet Fell out of Base already
customer_reviews.text: The lazer works great, can be hard to see in well lit rooms. For the price, you can't beat it. I just wish the Magnets would be more durable. I have had one fall out and now it has a tendency to slip down a 16th or so.
customer_reviews.author: Klocky

customer_reviews.title: amazing tool for plumbing and use around the house
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this laser. You dont know you need it until you have it!
customer_reviews.author: jonesjedidiah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Very sturdily built, heavy-duty and multifunctional. I mainly chose it because it seemed like errybody else already had a Bosch but I'd say this definitely stands out in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great product for conduit runs and drops! Easy to see in most applications
customer_reviews.author: Anvil88

customer_reviews.title: Vertical & Horizontal With Point Laser!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it in general. Great product for the price considering that you get a vertical and horizontal line laser plus the point laser. Magnets don't feel as strong as others but they work fine. I shot a straight line down the deck of my job for about 100' and laser line was slightly visible understandably from the daylight coming.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin Pioquinto

customer_reviews.title: Klein tools are dependable.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this laser has both the horizontal and vertical crosshairs and a plumb bob. This laser has a bright powerful light output visible even during the daylight. What is most impressive about this laser is how crisp the lines are even at 50’+ out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Over all a great laser very impressed I bought this one for my Van because the ones from our shop are always gone and it as exceeded my expectations a great laser and fair price
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Schoenherr

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for work and it's great, much cheaper and just as functional and accurate as the $500 DeWalt. Used it to hang curtain's in my house for my wife and now she uses it for everything in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, a must have
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping everything at the same level and installing can lights. Wish I hadn't waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Good laser level
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laser it works as it should. But if you are going to use this to install can lights or need a grid this laser can not do this. I would recommend buying the dewalt 5 beam laser level.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality product..... Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Superior tool for common everyday applications in my profession as maintenance technician and in my home life as well
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love this laser
customer_reviews.text: Works great, lockable laser to help keep accurate. Buttons are on top so your less likely to too have to readjust after turning it on and off. Great laser, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Csdean

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool nice price
customer_reviews.text: I’m an electrical contractor and I use this to shoot in lighting and receptacles where accuracy is a must
customer_reviews.author: Brad Swan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: Typical Klien quality! Very bright laser! A co worker bought a $400 dewalt and that thing is not bright as should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used on 3 projects so far and hasn't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it for hanging pictures and shelves.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use to hang shelves and pictures. Everything looks strait and level.
customer_reviews.author: Henry S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Crisp fine laser lines, easy to see, nice upgrade from my old laser
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great for electricians doing recessed or LED lighting
customer_reviews.text: Anything Klein that has a board in it is usually garbage. But this laser level is surprisingly good. No way Klein actually makes this, guessing it’s designed by Bosch or someone with experience with laser levels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool.
customer_reviews.text: there is a very similar laser by the yellow company Dwalt and is eighty dollars more. This one does the same thing and has an extra braket that can be mounted onto metal studs if you ever come across.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your Model
customer_reviews.text: I have only written this review because I've ordered it twice. I have gotten the wrong product both times. It is a Klein laser but not the model that is being advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great laser level
customer_reviews.text: Nice laser level. Love the plumb bob. Red can be a little hard to see in bright sun. I am an electrician. Using mostly for kitchens, recess lights, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Becareful , maybe I got a lemon but ....
customer_reviews.text: So after one week the battery compartment came loose , laser wouldn't work at all , ended up putting tape on the ledge part the the compartment latches to, temp fix i know , while it works , its a good laser just poor design
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: It a Klein
customer_reviews.text: Used the laser level to install a pot rack to a ceiling that was pitched in three different ways. Worked great to find all the centers and then used it to make sure everything was hanging level. Just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Erik Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Love everything about this. A must have for every electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality not good
customer_reviews.text: Stop working during first use. It worked for about 15 minutes then shut off. Changed the batteries and it turned on briefly before turning off again. Now it wont turn on at all. Cany return because the return window just expired.
customer_reviews.author: Rick perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool!
customer_reviews.text: This tool has turned out to be one of my most important. I don’t even use my 4’ level much any more. I had no idea before I bought it how much I would end up using it. I am using it to install shelves, hang doors, install door hardware, install cabinets. Quite a handy instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: First one the plumb laser didn’t work but easily returned it and got another one. Works perfect. Even dropped it from about 30 feet no problems don’t recommend but still worked
customer_reviews.author: Gt88

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item
customer_reviews.text: It worked for one day.. maybe two. Didn't use it then replaced batteries but it ended up swelling the batteries, and yes they were put in correctly. It has been over a month so now I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, I should've brought a dewalt
customer_reviews.text: The magnet on the back fell off and glass for the spot just fell in the device
customer_reviews.author: Joel Tejeda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bigger then the Dewalt version, but it’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: J148

customer_reviews.title: Amazing prixe
customer_reviews.text: Love does what all the expensive ones do and for half the price
customer_reviews.author: ramon corral

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnets
customer_reviews.text: Good accuracy, build quality. Magnets are too weak though, some serious concern for it dropping when placed up high.
customer_reviews.author: James Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laser
customer_reviews.text: Best laser I've owned, especially for the price! All the guys I work with wanted one after I got mine
customer_reviews.author: JHamborSr

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Have used to lay out overhead lighting on 20’ plus ceilings. Rugged design and perfect spots every time
customer_reviews.author: Guy R Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tool. But magnet could be stronger. Great product though. I use it daily
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Magnet could use an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Love this laser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laser! I find uses for it I hadent even planned for when I bought it. The red laser is hard to see in sun light but for the price you cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Could be brighter
customer_reviews.text: Construction is very durable so far. Could be a lot brighter though. They need to make a green light laser.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Naxera

customer_reviews.title: Should cost more
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laser. Lots of potential uses. Durable + hard case= yes please
customer_reviews.author: John & Casey Whited

customer_reviews.title: Klein Tools reputation of good solid quality tools.
customer_reviews.text: This laser level is awesome with a over a 3’ fall impact resistance I’m sold!!
customer_reviews.author: PikesRide

customer_reviews.title: Makes lighting layout EASY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for laying out lighting the plumb bob alone is way better then the rack a tiers one.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Pentimone

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The Klein laser has a ridged plastic case that protects the laser. It is well built and easy to use. I’ve used it for 3 weeks on a daily basis with no issues. I definitely recommend this laser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOOL
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I'm a Pipe Fitter from Louisiana and I use this tool quite a bit. Only down side is that the storage box allows dust to get in. But if that's the word complaint I have, not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Good lazerca
customer_reviews.text: Good lazer my only complaint is that you cant lock the lazer and use it out of alingment.
customer_reviews.author: Alphacorzine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As good as $300 of the same. Klein doesn’t ever disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Has been my husbands go to for years just re purchased because he enjoyeed it so much. Great for multiple task especially if working in the construction field.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1 laser
customer_reviews.text: Great Level, good price only down side is it uses a red light, instead of green. Besides that good find.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rock

customer_reviews.title: Not rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: I wish this were USB rechargeable with green lasers, it is what they say it is and it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING WORTH EVERY PENNY.
customer_reviews.text: Works great compared to a bosh laser it’s equal if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Klein always kills it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish it was a green lazer but the plumb dot is very handy and for its price it is worth it. About half the price of a Bosch
customer_reviews.author: Jerad T Brown

customer_reviews.title: very nice laser...affordable but put together job site tough
customer_reviews.text: nice case...feels solid...what you expect from Klein and they dont disappoint...
customer_reviews.author: Derek Gosselink

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because one person is able to do the layout on the floor and then transfer to ceiling instead of measuring off a ladder. After only a few months that stop working
customer_reviews.author: Willy Izaguirre

customer_reviews.title: Worked.
customer_reviews.text: Did ok in brighter light. Most electricians work in darker environments.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great laser for the price
customer_reviews.text: One of the best ones in this price range. Highly recommend for cheap electricians like me.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Isaac Dillman

customer_reviews.title: great for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: works great in all situations! can see on ceiling of a lite factory.
customer_reviews.author: Dyllin summerer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I’m an electrician an this laser has worked really well laying out conduit runs from the floor, setting boxes etc. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dave Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Laser level
customer_reviews.text: Works great for measurement and straight lines for lay out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Snemis

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. cant wait to use it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: juan larios

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the strongest little laser , but works well for the money . Plenty of beam options
customer_reviews.author: robert armington

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use bought another one after buying the first one
customer_reviews.author: kevin sharp

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, make my job 10 times easier. It would have been nice if he had a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Ioan Teaca

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have purchased this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: This has an endless amount of uses. Buy with zero regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect from a red laser plumb bob/line level at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been impressed with this for the price. Knowing it was a red laser and not green you obviously lose some strength on the long runs but it works great for laying out lighting from the floor and batteries last pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: C_Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I like turtles
customer_reviews.text: I wish the laser was brighter. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyin Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I recommended to 2 of my coworker .
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin v.

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: This unit is nice has all the lines you’ll need to complete Very happy
customer_reviews.author: darkninja

product_meta.title: Klein Tools Self-Leveling Cross-Line Laser Level with Plumb Spot
product_meta.description: Style:Laser Level with Red Cross-Line and Plumb SpotThe Klein Tools Self-Levelling Cross-Line Laser Level is a high-performance laser levelling and alignment tool for professionals. This level provides a reliable, pendulum self-levelling system with clear, bright laser level lines and a 90 vertical plumb-spot feature. Equipped with an integrated magnetic mount and an additional ceiling clip mount, Kleins cross-line level enables a multitude of alignment and layout applications. Self-leveling laser level with clear, easy-to-read laser lines. Level comes with integrated magnetic mount and ceiling clip mount. Includes a hard plastic carrying case for safe transport. Durable enough to withstand a 3.3-Foot drop. Low battery indicator and easily accessible battery compartment. Water and dust resistant (IP54). Hard plastic carrying case included. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.
feature_bullets: Laser Levelwith self-leveling, easy-to-read horizontal and vertical laser lines with plumb spot lasers to pinpoint overhead locations
Level projects horizontal and vertical lines independently or together for various alignments
Water and dust resistant (IP54), hard plastic carrying case included
Integrated magnetic 360-degree mounting bracket with 1/4-Inch and 5/8-Inch tripod mounting threads
Additional mounting clamp attachment for use on ceiling grid applications

specifications.Style: Laser Level with Red Cross-Line and Plumb Spot
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars483 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
